Evaluate the system's response to an integral transformation \\( T[z] = \\int_0^t e^{-(s-t)M}z(s) ds \\), where M is a constant matrix.

Based on the observation of \\( z(T) \\) at time T, can we determine the original function \\( z(0) \\) without knowing if the transformation \\( T[z] \\) was applied?
